Text:
Works perfectly, thank you!


Just let me add this to your Installation Instructions:

- Install program.Do not launch Ashampoo WinOptimizer 10 yet.
- Run "Regme" from Registration folder according to OS installed (32 or 64bit)--> file x64 is for a 64 bit platform while the file x86 is for a 32bit platform.
- Done, Enjoy.
